info.title: liights Out!
info.author: BHSPitMonkey
info.details:
Try to turn out all the lights.
  D-Pad or IR to move
  A to select
  +/- to switch levels
  More instructions available in-game
  
Changelog:

v1.0 beta 5
  Fixed some lag while using menu buttons
    caused by unnecessary logging
  Fixed broken animation on the main menu's
    background
  Added the background animation to all
    screens in the game

v1.0 beta 4
  Added some (rough) instruction pages
  Improved menu navigation
  Puzzles are now loaded from
   /apps/liightsout/data/puzzles.txt (you
   can create your own puzzles by editing
   this file!)
  Added "Free Mode", allows you to freely
   toggle single lights. Useful for designing
   your own levels. No "save" function yet.
   Enable by pressing the Two (or X) button.
  Probably some other changes I can't think
   of at the moment. :)

v1.0 beta 3
  Internal release

v1.0 beta 2
  First public beta
